```pddl
[
  (:action choose ; Choose an option and update its status
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?option - object ?context - context)
    :precondition (and (not (selected ?option)) (context_applicable ?context ?option))
    :effect (and (selected ?option) (context_updated ?context))
  ),
  
  (:action move
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?destination - location)
    :precondition (and (location ?agent ?current_location) (not (location ?agent ?destination)))
    :effect (and (not (location ?agent ?current_location)) (location ?agent ?destination))
  )
]
```
